name: CleanOS
description:
Introducing CleanOS!

Features:
- CleanPlay Mode!
Optimizes CleanOS for games.
-CleanBrowser!
Refreshed and clean browser!
-Pre-installed games and apps!
-Seems cool.

Compatibility

This is for Windows 10 only. This features emojis that old Windows OS can't format.
Must have Microsoft 365.
